history.proof: intros p q l a b H. sauto l: on depth: 3.

ctx: intros p q l a b H.
tactic: induction H as [| | p1 p2 l1 l2 l3 a1 a2 Hlt Hplus IH].
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 6 branches.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall (p q l : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) l -> exists l1 : list (Term A n), ltT (A:=A) ltM b a /\ plusP p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) l1 /\ l = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a l1 \/ ltT (A:=A) ltM a b /\ plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) q l1 /\ l = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b l1 \/ eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a b /\ (zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) /\ plusP p q l \/ ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) /\ plusP p q l1 /\ l = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a b) l1)

Premises:
pX : forall (A : Set) (n : nat), Term A n -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n)
CoefStructure : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A), A -> forall eqA : A -> A -> Prop, (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> A -> A) -> (A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A) -> Prop
eqT : forall (A : Set) (n : nat), Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop
OrderStructure : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> (A -> A -> A) -> Prop
ltT : forall (A : Set) (n : nat), (mon n -> mon n -> Prop) -> Term A n -> Term A n -> Prop
mult_mon : forall d : nat, mon d -> mon d -> mon d
Inductive plusP : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop := nillu1 : forall l1 : list (Term A n), plusP (pO A n) l1 l1 | nillu2 : forall l1 : list (Term A n), plusP l1 (pO A n) l1 | mainu1 : forall (a1 a2 : Term A n) (l1 l2 l3 : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM a2 a1 -> plusP l1 (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a
Inductive mon : nat -> Set := n_0 : mon 0 | c_n : forall d : nat, nat -> mon d -> mon (S d) Arguments mon _%nat_scope Arguments c_n (_ _)%nat_scope
zeroP : forall A : Set, A -> (A -> A -> Prop) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Prop
zero_mon : forall d : nat, mon d
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
plusTerm : forall A : Set, (A -> A -> A) -> forall n : nat, Term A n -> Term A n -> Term A n
plusP_sind : forall P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> SProp, (forall l1 : list (Term A n), P (pO A n) l1 l1) -> (forall l1 : list (Term A n), P l1 (pO A n) l1) ->...-> P l l0 l1
plusP_ind : forall P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop, (forall l1 : list (Term A n), P (pO A n) l1 l1) -> (forall l1 : list (Term A n), P l1 (pO A n) l1) ->...-> P l l0 l1
mainu2b : forall (a1 a2 : Term A n) (l1 l2 l3 : list (Term A n)), plusP l1 l2 l3 -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 a2 -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a1 a2) -> plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 l1) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a2 l2) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a1 a2) l3)
mainu2a : forall (a1 a2 : Term A n) (l1 l2 l3 : list (Term A n)), plusP l1 l2 l3 -> eqT (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 a2 -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (plusTerm plusA (n:=n) a1 a2) -> plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 l1) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a2 l2) l3
ltP_ind : forall (A : Set) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop), (forall (x : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), P (pO A n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) x p)) -> (forall (x y : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM x y -> P (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) x p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) y q)) ->...-> P l l0
ltP_sind : forall (A : Set) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> SProp), (forall (x : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), P (pO A n) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) x p)) -> (forall (x y : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM x y -> P (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) x p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) y q)) ->...-> P l l0
pX_invr : forall (A : Set) (n : nat) (p q : list (Term A n)) (a b : Term A n), pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q -> p = q
ltP_pX_canonical : forall (A : Set) (A0 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (a : Term A n) (p : list (Term A n)), canonical A0 eqA ltM p -> ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a -> ltP (A:=A) ltM p (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a (pO A n)) -> canonical A0 eqA ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p)
pX_invl : forall (A : Set) (n : nat) (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p = pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q -> a = b
eqP_ind : forall (A : Set) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> Prop), P (pO A n) (pO A n) -> (forall (ma mb : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) ma mb -> eqP A eqA n p q -> P p q -> P (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ma p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) mb q)) -> forall l l0 : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n l l0 -> P l l0
eqP_sind : forall (A : Set) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (P : list (Term A n) -> list (Term A n) -> SProp), P (pO A n) (pO A n) -> (forall (ma mb : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqTerm eqA (n:=n) ma mb -> eqP A eqA n p q -> P p q -> P (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) ma p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) mb q)) -> forall l l0 : list (Term A n), eqP A eqA n l l0 -> P l l0
ltP_order_comp : forall (A : Set) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a b c : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), ltP (A:=A) ltM (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a q) -> ltT (A:=A) ltM a c -> ltT (A:=A) ltM b c
eqp_inv3r : forall (A : Set) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (n : nat) (a b : Term A n) (p q : list (Term A n)), eqP A eqA n (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) b q) -> eqP A eqA n p q
left : ?A -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]
inleft : ?A -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]
ssrbool.is_inleft : ?A + {?B} -> bool where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]
right : ?B -> {?A} + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]
inright : ?B -> ?A + {?B} where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Prop]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Set A0 : A A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA : A -> A -> A multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n ->...-> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) |- Type]
multTerm_zeroP_div : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> (forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}) -> forall (n : nat) (a b : Term A n), zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) (multTerm multA (n:=n) a b) -> zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a \/ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) b
mainu1 : forall (a1 a2 : Term A n) (l1 l2 l3 : list (Term A n)), ltT (A:=A) ltM a2 a1 -> plusP l1 (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a2 l2) l3 -> plusP (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 l1) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a2 l2) (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 l3)

```coq
intros p q l a b H.
induction H as [| | p1 p2 l1 l2 l3 a1 a2 Hlt Hplus IH].
- exists l. intuition.
- exists l. intuition.
- destruct (ltM_dec a a2) as [Hlt' | [Hgt | Heq]].
  + exists (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p2). split. apply Hlt'. split. apply IH. reflexivity.
  + exists (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 p1). split. apply Hgt. split. apply IH. reflexivity.
  + subst a2. exists l3. split. apply eqT_refl. split. apply IH. reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros p q l a b H. induction H as [| | p1 p2 l1 l2 l3 a1 a2 Hlt Hplus IH]. - exists l. intuition. - exists l. intuition. - destruct (ltM_dec a a2) as [Hlt' | [Hgt | Heq]]. + exists (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a p2). split. apply Hlt'. split. apply IH. reflexivity. + exists (pX (A:=A) (n:=n) a1 p1). split. apply Hgt. split. apply IH. reflexivity. + subst a2. exists l3. split. apply eqT_refl. split. apply IH. reflexivity.
